      • getHostedPaymentPageLink

        public java.net.URI getHostedPaymentPageLink(java.lang.String paymentId,
                                             java.lang.String resource_token,
                                             java.net.URI returnUri)
        Description copied from interface: IHostedPaymentPageLinkBuilder
        Builds a link to TrueLayer HPP with the given details
        Specified by:
        getHostedPaymentPageLink in interface IHostedPaymentPageLinkBuilder
        Parameters:
        paymentId - the id of the payment created with a previous call to the Create Payment endpoint
        resource_token - the token of the payment created with a previous call to the Create Payment endpoint
        returnUri - the return URI where the client will be redirected once the payment is completed
        Returns:
        the link to TrueLayer hosted payment page
        See Also:
        See Hosted Payment Page documentaion for further details
